Hi, I'm Rohan Kulkarni. I use the internet to learn and data to solve problems.

Some of my interests include data science & engineering, machine learning, cryptocurrency, cybersecurity, alternative education, basketball and hip-hop.


Projects

Tally AI

An online platform for small businesses that aggregates data from review sites such as Yelp & Foursquare, and provides sentiment analysis on what customers are saying about them and their competitors

Skills: Data Engineering, Natural Language Processing
Technologies: Pandas, Django, spaCy, vaderSentiment

NBA Career Longevity Predictor

Predicts how many years a given NBA player will last based on the stats of himself and his peers. A player comparison is provided as well.

Skills: Data Engineering, Machine Learning
Technologies: Flask, PostgreSQL, Sci-kit learn

Reddit Recommender

Have something to share on Reddit but donâ€™t know which subreddit to post in? Input your thought to Reddit Recommender and let it suggest you one.

Skills: Data Engineering, Machine Learning
Technologies: Pandas, Sci-kit learn

TwitOff

Choose two Twitter handles, input some text, and let Twitoff predict which user is more likely to tweet the given text.

Skills: Data Engineering, Machine Learning
Technologies: Twitter API, Flask, SQLAlchemy, Sci-kit learn

Background

I studied Computer Science at Drexel University for 3 years and Data Science at Lambda School for 9 months. I've done two Co-ops -- Data Scientist @ Verif-y (2018) and Cybersecurity Analyst @ Day & Zimmermann (2017) -- 6 months each.

Currently looking for a full-time opportunity, if you think we'd work well together feel free to reach out.
